title: TestAmenT - The New Order
description:
Testament - The New Order

about TestAmenT:
Testament is a trash metal band
started in San Fransisco 1983.
It&#039;s said they were the first
trash metal band that didn&#039;t 
reach the top. They were even 
about to challenge Metallica
in popularity. The Band recently
released a new cd, their first
studio recording in ten years.

Year: 1988
Genre: Trash

This CD, as like my other ones comes in three formats: 128 kbps, 320 kbps and a 100% quality .nrg (Nero Image) file. Just DL the torrent and disable the things you dont want to have.

Specifications:

mp3 128 kbps: good for downloading to portable devices/mp3 players, less quality.

mp3 320 kbps: handy smallsized files with pretty good quality for the music collector.

.nrg file: a 100% quality copy of the original CD, copied at low speed which maintains the quality of the CD, ready for mounting and burning.

No CD Covers were available for this CD, and I have no scanner. If you find any covers for this CD, post the url and I may put them in the DL, or make a new one.
